tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste_collection_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  schedule_day VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  schedule_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionSchedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    collection_day VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    collection_time TIME NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_site_id FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionSites (site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES biodegradable_waste_collection_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    collected_quantity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES waste_collection_schedules(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collection_sites (
  site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  address TEXT NOT NULL,
  city TEXT NOT NULL,
  capacity INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionHistory (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES BiodegradableSites(site_id),
  schedule_id INT REFERENCES CollectionSchedules(schedule_id),
  collection_date DATE,
  waste_type_id INT REFERENCES WasteTypes(waste_type_id)
);
